Romance.description: Shahrzad, a talented music student, flees Iran and agrees to marry a man in Los Angeles. Her new life is quickly threatened by a passionate relationship with her piano teacher's gardener.

Romance.title: The Big Wedding
Romance.description: To the amusement of their adult children and friends, long-divorced couple Don and Ellie Griffin (De Niro and Keaton) are once again forced to play the happy couple for the sake of their adopted son's wedding.

Romance.title: Billboard Dad
Romance.description: Two sisters (Mary-Kate Olsen, Ashley Olsen) print a personals ad on a billboard to find a match for their newly single father.

Romance.title: Blind
Romance.description: A bestselling novelist (Alec Baldwin) loses his sight in a vicious car crash. Five years later, a Socialite (Demi Moore) is forced to read to the novelist as a plea bargain for her husband's insider trading. A passionate affair ensues.

Romance.title: The Blue Room
Romance.description: Two adulterous lovers go from pillow talk to possible murder in this sexy, brain-teasing thriller. Mathieu Amalric (The Diving Bell and the Butterfly, Grand Budapest Hotel) directs and stars as Julien, a middle-aged salesman embroiled in a steamy love affair with a married woman who, after a round of kinky sex, makes a startling suggestion. Suddenly Julien is caught up in a police investigation—but just what exactly happened? Based on a novel by celebrated crime writer Georges Simenon, this beguiling cinematic puzzle keeps the audience guessing every step of the way.

Romance.title: Book Club
Romance.description: Four friends' lives are turned upside down to hilarious ends when their book club tackles the infamous Fifty Shades of Grey.

Romance.title: Border
Romance.description: A customs officer who can smell fear develops an unusual attraction to a strange traveler while aiding a police investigation which will call into question her entire existence.

Romance.title: The Boy Downstairs.
Romance.description: An aspiring writer returns to New York after a few years abroad, only to discover that her ex-boyfriend is living in the same building.

Romance.title: Breakup at a Wedding
Romance.description: A videographer captures an engaged couple's decision to proceed with a sham wedding after the bride calls off the ceremony and decides to break up with her partner, who secretly hopes that his surprise gift will ultimately change her mind.

Romance.title: Cashback.
Romance.description: Ben develops insomnia after a painful breakup. To kill time, he takes a night shift at the local supermarket. Dealing with the boredom of an eight-hour shift, Ben imagines freezing time, which allows him to see the beauty of the everyday world.

Romance.title: Christmas Belle
Romance.description: It's "Beauty and the Beast" for Christmas when auctioneer Belle goes to catalog and finalize Hunter's estate sale. Hunter begins to soften as they work together, though, putting both the estate sale and Belle's heart in jeopardy.

Romance.title: The Christmas Calendar
Romance.description: When Emily, a small town baker, receives a Christmas Calendar from a secret admirer, it attracts the attention of the locals. With financial problems looming, the calendar turns out to be a Christmas miracle for Emily and the bakery.

Romance.title: A Christmas Kiss II
Romance.description: A passionate, mistletoe-instigated kiss in an elevator inspires a millionaire playboy and his sister’s relationship, gun-shy executive assistant to take a romantic leap of faith at Christmas.

Romance.title: Christmas Perfection
Romance.description: A woman magically wakes up in her perfect Christmas village in Ireland.

Romance.title: A Cinderella Christmas
Romance.description: The Christmasquerade Ball gives hardworking Angie a chance to let loose. She quickly charms Nicholas but has to go suddenly, leaving him only one clue to find her in this modern, holiday take on the classic fairytale.

Romance.title: Crash Pad
Romance.description: A man thinks he has found true love with an older woman until he finds out she is married and using him to get revenge on her husband.

Romance.title: Cruise
Romance.description: Set in the 1980s, a young Italian-American from the "wrong side of the tracks" falls for a Jewish girl from Long Island.

Romance.title: Dirty Dancing.
Romance.description: Spending the summer in a holiday camp with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor Johnny Castle

Romance.title: Dirty Dancing: Havana Nights.
Romance.description: Katie arrives in Cuba where she meets Javier and discovers a passion.

Romance.title: Dog Days
Romance.description: Dog Days is a hilarious and heartfelt comedy that follows the lives of multiple dog owners and their beloved fluffy pals around Los Angeles. When these human and canines’ paths start to intertwine, their lives begin changing in ways they never expected.

Romance.title: A Dogwalker's Christmas Tale
Romance.description: Luce is a reluctant dog walker this Christmas, but as she makes friends at the local dog park, including Dean, a handsome dog walker, she must take sides when her boss announces plans to bulldoze the park in the new year to build a spa.

Romance.title: Drinking Buddies
Romance.description: Although they're both dating other people, two co-workers (Olivia Wilde, Jake Johnson) hang out together in bars and try to ignore their mutual attraction.

Romance.title: The Duchess of Langeais
Romance.description: Antoinette (Balibara) is the Duchess, a married coquette who frequents the most extravagant balls in 1820's Paris during The Restoration. Hypocrisy and vanity reign. Handsome general Armand de Montriveau (Guillaume Depardieu) feels true love upon first meeting the Duchess. Flattered, the alluring Antoinette orchestrates a calculated game of seduction, but repeatedly refuses the general. Despite his sincere romantic declarations, Montriveau's passion remains unfulfilled. When he eventually seeks revenge, Antoinette's love awakens. But it may well be too late for the star-crossed lovers.

Romance.title: The Escort
Romance.description: Desperate for a good story, a sex-addicted journalist throws himself into the world of high-class escorts when he starts following a Stanford-educated prostitute.

Romance.title: Every Day
Romance.description: "Every Day" tells the story of Rhiannon, a 16-year old girl who falls in love with a mysterious spirit named "A" that inhabits a different body every day.

Romance.title: The Female Brain
Romance.description: What makes a woman swipe right for Mr. Wrong? Sofía Vergara and Whitney Cummings star in this fresh, witty look at the science behind our romantic missteps.

Romance.title: Finding Your Feet
Romance.description: On the eve of retirement, a middle-class snob discovers her husband has been having an affair, and is forced to live with her bohemian sister on an impoverished inner-city estate.

Romance.title: First Girl I Loved
Romance.description: In this Sundance award-winner, high-school misfit Anne falls in love with Sasha, the beautiful star of the softball team. When Anne tells her best friend Clifton about her new crush, his jealousy threatens more than just the girls' budding romance.

Romance.title: Forever My Girl
Romance.description: A country music super-star returns to his hometown after leaving his love behind 8 years ago.

Romance.title: Friends With Kids
Romance.description: In the wake of their friends' marriages and eventual offspring, longtime pals Julie (Jennifer Westfeldt) and Jason (Adam Scott) decide to have a child together without becoming a couple. By becoming "time-share" parents, they reason, they can experience the joys of parenthood without significantly curbing their personal freedom. However, when Julie and Jason both become involved with others, they discover that they secretly harbor romantic feelings for each other.

Romance.title: The Girl King
Romance.description: Sweden’s Queen Kristina, a flamboyant and unpredictable woman who ascended the throne at age six, was raised as a prince and strived to bring peace and education to her country—all while pursuing an illicit romance with her female royal attendant.

Romance.title: Girlfriends of Christmas Past
Romance.description: Expecting a proposal, Livvy gets dumped instead. She finds two more women her ex wronged and the trio decide on payback. Meanwhile, Livvy meets Carter and sparks begin to fly. Can she forget about revenge and let a Christmas romance bloom?

Romance.title: Gloria.
Romance.description: Gloria is a "woman of a certain age" who gets caught up in a passionate whirlwind romance with a retired naval officer, whom she meets at a dance club for singles.

Romance.title: Goodbye First Love
Romance.description: Mia Hansen-Love returns with GOODBYE FIRST LOVE, an acutely perceptive portrait of a bright young woman in the wake of her first romance. Fifteen-year-old Camille (Lola Creton) is a serious girl who has fallen in love with the cheerful Sullivan (Sebastian Urzendowsky), an older boy who returns her feelings, mostly, but wants to be free to explore the world. When he leaves her to travel, she is devastated, but develops over the following years, into a more fully formed woman, with new interests and a new love - and the possibility that she'll be less defenseless when Sullivan enters her life again. Hansen-Love's follow up to the award-winning THE FATHER OF MY CHILDREN is filled with scenes that showcase her extraordinary ability to evoke moods and feelings. The story of a young woman's first romance is made into a singular experience, familiar in its broad strokes and yet so specific that it feels uniquely personal.

Romance.title: Half Magic
Romance.description: Three women use their newly formed sisterhood to fight against sexism, bad relationships and low self-esteem. Through embracing their wild adventures, they learn the secret to ultimate fulfillment.

Romance.title: Happy Accidents
Romance.description: A young woman finds love and happiness until her new boyfriend announces he is from the year 2470. Marisa Tomei and Vincent D'Onofrio star.

Romance.title: Heathers
Romance.description: Westerburg High School's elite clique of popular girls is "The Heathers," comprised of the powerful Heather Chandler, the green-with-envy Heather Duke, and the cowardly Heather McNamara. Rounding out the foursome is Veronica Sawyer (Winona Ryder), who is so fed up with the Heathers and the entire peer pressure cooker that she starts running with J.D. (Christian Slater), a mysterious - and possibly psychotic - motorcycle-riding newcomer. But what begins as their noble effort to rid Westerburg of its bad apples ends up taking a real toll. And their teen rebellion produces a serious and mounting body count. Shannen Doherty co-stars in this cruelly hilarious dark comedy, which became one of the biggest cult classics of the '80s.

Romance.title: Hitch
Romance.description: A New York man has a secret identity moonlighting as a dating doctor who specializes in planning dates for lovesick men.  He, himself, is adrift to the wonders of love until he meets and falls in love with a tabloid journalist who seeks his services in order to expose the doc as a scam artist, which jeopardizes uncovering his secret identity, until she finds out things about him as well as herself.

Romance.title: Holly's Holiday
Romance.description: Holly Maddux longs for a man like the mannequin in a nearby store. After she slips and hits her head, she wakes to a perfect gentleman by her side. Holly hits it off with her new man but must choose between the perfect life and real love.

Romance.title: The Housemaid
Romance.description: A forbidden passion awakens vengeful spirits within a haunted mansion in this bloodcurdling, erotic tour-de-force.

Romance.title: I Still Believe.
Romance.description: From the makers of I CAN ONLY IMAGINE comes the true life story of Christian music mega star Jeremy Camp. His remarkable journey of love and loss proves there is always hope in the midst of tragedy and that faith tested is the only faith worth sharing.

Romance.title: I'll Come Running
Romance.description: A young American woman finds herself drawn to a last-minute trip to Denmark, so that she can learn more about the man she loves.

Romance.title: If Beale Street Could Talk
Romance.description: Based on the novel by James Baldwin, "If Beale Street Could Talk" is a soulful drama about a young couple fighting for justice in the name of love and the promise of the American dream.

Romance.title: In a Relationship
Romance.description: Owen and Hallie have been together for years, but when Owen wavers on Hallie’s proposition to move in together, they make the rash decision to call it quits.

Romance.title: Ismael's Ghosts
Romance.description: Twenty-one years ago, she ran away. And twenty-one years later, Carlotta (Marion Cotillard) is back from the void. But Ismael (Mathieu Amalric) has been busy rebuilding his life with Sylvia (Charlotte Gainsbourg) and working on his next feature film.

Romance.title: Juliet, Naked
Romance.description: Annie (the long-suffering girlfriend of Duncan) develops an unlikely transatlantic romance with the once admired, now washed up, singer-songwriter, Tucker Crowe, who also happens to be the subject of Duncan's musical obsession.

Romance.title: Larry Crowne.
Romance.description: A middle-aged man (Tom Hanks) loses his job, enrolls in college, and reinvents himself.

Romance.title: Leaving
Romance.description: Kristin Scott Thomas plays a married woman whose forbidden, adulterous affair with a handyman prompts her jealous husband to launch a revengeful campaign of blackmail.

Romance.title: Let the Right One In.
Romance.description: Lonely, 12-year-old Oskar is regularly bullied by his stronger classmates.  A new friendship develops when Eli, a pale, serious young girl who only comes out at night, moves in next door.

Romance.title: Let the Sunshine In
Romance.description: Juliette Binoche and Gerard Depardieu star in this charming romantic comedy about a woman looking for love in all the wrong places.

Romance.title: A Life Less Ordinary.
Romance.description: Disgruntled "divine interveners" foster a romance between a "dreamer" who has just lost everything and his kidnap victim, a sardonic rich woman who loathes her ruthless father.

Romance.title: Like Crazy.
Romance.description: A British college student falls for an American student, only to be separated from him when she's banned from the U.S. after overstaying her visa.

Romance.title: Literally, Right Before Aaron
Romance.description: Adam (Justin Long) is definitely still in love with his ex (Cobie Smulders). So when he shows up at her wedding to prove that he's moved on, a series of funny and awkward encounters only confirms he's more in love with her than ever.

Romance.title: The Little Death
Romance.description: A game of sexual role-playing convinces a man that he wants to become a full-time actor, in one of several stories of suburbanites exploring erotic fetishes.

Romance.title: Love After Love
Romance.description: Andie MacDowell shines as a mother exploring a new beginning while watching her sons' lives fall apart in this funny and inspiring drama.

Romance.title: The Lovers
Romance.description: After a dangerous dive into the wreckage of a British merchant ship to save his wife, a marine biologist falls into a coma that transports us back in time to India in 1788, where a young British captain falls for an Indian woman, in this tale of two centuries, two continents and star-crossed lovers linked together by a powerful ring. Stars Josh Hartnett.

Romance.title: The March Sisters at Christmas
Romance.description: A modern retelling of Louisa May Alcott's "Little Women" follows four sisters who learn their mother plans on selling their home after the holidays. In an effort to keep the family together, the sisters try to restore the house.

Romance.title: Marguerite & Julien
Romance.description: Forbidden passion blazes between a brother and sister in this feverishly sexy romance.

Romance.title: Married by Christmas
Romance.description: Carrie and Katie realize their family’s company will be inherited by the first sister to marry. With Katie’s Christmas Eve wedding already planned, workaholic Carrie sets out to elope before it’s too late.

Romance.title: Meet Me in Montenegro.
Romance.description: In this globe-trotting, funny romance two ex-lovers meet by chance during a visit to Berlin, and their affair is rekindled in spite of the fact that they are both moving to opposite ends of the earth in forty-eight hours.

Romance.title: The Messenger
Romance.description: Will, an Iraq War veteran, struggles with his new post at the Casualty Notification Office. Under mentorship of fellow officer, Tony, the two men form a bond that will ultimately help them to readjust to "normal" life.

Romance.title: Middle of Nowhere
Romance.description: A restless troublemaking teenager falls for a tightly wound co-worker as they team up to earn big money and escape their families.

Romance.title: The Monkey King 3
Romance.description: The Monkey King and his traveling companions must find a way to escape from the clutches of a queen who rules an all-female kingdom. They soon land in even deeper trouble when their shenanigans anger the mighty River God.

Romance.title: Monogamy
Romance.description: Brooklyn photographer Theo - miserable shooting weddings for a living - starts up a cool new business, taking surveillance-style photos of clients. But when an alluring female hires his services, the shutterbug falls into a world of lust and jealousy.

Romance.title: Morning Glory
Romance.description: An upstart television producer accepts the challenge of reviving a struggling morning show program with warring co-hosts.

Romance.title: My Santa (2013).
Romance.description: Single mother Jen has a dislike for the holidays. But after meeting handsome mall Santa Chris, Jen starts to rediscover the magic of Christmas... not aware that Chris is actually the son of the real Santa Claus, on a mission to find a Mrs. Claus.

Romance.title: Naughty & Nice
Romance.description: When a cynical Los Angeles DJ is exiled to a quaint mountain town for the holiday season, the small-town charm and holiday cheer—not to mention his pretty new co-host—begin to melt his icy demeanor.

Romance.title: No Strings Attached
Romance.description: A guy and girl try to keep their relationship strictly physical, but it's not long before they learn that they want something more.

Romance.title: Nobody's Fool
Romance.description: A woman is released from prison and reunites with her sister. She soon discovers that her sister is in an online relationship with a man who may not be what he seems.

Romance.title: Non-Fiction.
Romance.description: Juliette Binoche and Guillame Canet star in this witty, seductive tale of sex, lies, and literature from acclaimed director Olivier Assayas (Personal Shopper, Carlos).

Romance.title: Once Upon a Time
Romance.description: Based on the best-selling fantasy novel Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossoms, ONCE UPON A TIME is a story of epic battles, deep passion, and the powerful forces that drive mortals and gods alike toward revenge, loyalty, and eternal love.

Romance.title: Overboard
Romance.description: A selfish, rich playboy, Leonardo, fires a hard-working single mother, Kate, hired to clean his yacht. After getting amnesia Kate convinces him he is her husband as payback and puts him to work.

Romance.title: Playing It Cool
Romance.description: A young man meets and instantly falls in love with an engaged woman.

Romance.title: Plus One
Romance.description: Long-time friends Alice and Ben agree to be one another’s plus ones as they power through an endless parade of insufferable weddings.

Romance.title: Portrait of a Lady on Fire.
Romance.description: In 18th century France a young painter, Marianne (Noémie Merlant), is commissioned to do the wedding portrait of Héloïse (Adèle Haenel). Day by day, the two women become closer as they share Héloïse's last moments of freedom before the impending wedding.

Romance.title: Premature.
Romance.description: A young woman finds herself on the precipice of adulthood as she navigates her way through the highs and lows of a life-changing summer romance in Harlem.

Romance.title: Princess Cyd
Romance.description: Eager to escape life with her single father, 16-year-old athlete Cyd visits her novelist aunt in Chicago over the summer. There, she falls for a girl in the neighborhood, while she and her aunt gently challenge each other in the realms of sex and spirit.

Romance.title: The Princess of Montpensier
Romance.description: The life of a ravishing young princess is torn apart by lust and forbidden desire, in this epic period drama.

Romance.title: A Puppy for Christmas
Romance.description: All Noelle wants for Christmas is a puppy. But her furry friend is mischievous and gets them both evicted. Spending the holidays with her coworker, sparks begin to fly. When Noelle's ex shows up, she must decide which man she wants.

Romance.title: Results
Romance.description: Personal trainers (Cobie Smulders and Guy Pearce) are tasked with getting a newly wealthy and highly unmotivated client (Kevin Corrigan) into shape in this smart and funny comedy about love and fitness.

Romance.title: Robin Hood: Men in Tights.
Romance.description: Mel Brooks puts his comic touch on the legendary bandit of Sherwood Forest in this hilarious spoof.

Romance.title: Rodeo & Juliet
Romance.description: A city girl is forced to go to the country where she meets a special horse and a young cowboy who teaaches her to barrel race while her mother reconnects with her former fiancé.

Romance.title: Romeo and Juliet (2013).
Romance.description: Romeo and Juliet secretly wed despite the sworn contempt their families hold for each other. It is not long, however, before a chain of fateful events changes the lives of both families forever.

Romance.title: Rosy
Romance.description: A socially awkward man kidnaps an aspiring actress so she can get to know him, but he soon gets much more than he bargained for.

Romance.title: Serena
Romance.description: In Depression-era North Carolina, the barren wife (Jennifer Lawrence) of an ambitious timber baron (Bradley Cooper) sets out to murder the woman who bore her husband an illegitimate son.

Romance.title: Shirley Valentine.
Romance.description: Shirley's a middle-aged Liverpool housewife, who finds herself talking to the wall while she prepares her husband's chip 'n' egg.

Romance.title: Slums Of Beverly Hills.
Romance.description: A desperate father moves his family to the un-glamorous fringes of Beverly Hills in an effort to improve his childrens' education.

Romance.title: So This Is Christmas
Romance.description: Eighteen-year-old Ashley's life is headed in the wrong direction. She's been hanging out with a bad crowd and seeking an escape from the drama at home.

Romance.title: The Spirit of Christmas
Romance.description: Kate is sent to broker the sale of Hollygrove Inn where she discovers Daniel and agrees to help him solve the mystery of his murder to help him move on, but she didn’t plan on falling in love along the way.

Romance.title: Sprung.
Romance.description: Two pairs of best friends - Montel & Clyde and Brandy & Adina - meet at a party and hook up, resulting in two very different relationships.

Romance.title: Stella's Last Weekend
Romance.description: Brothers Jack (Nat Wolff) and Oliver (Alex Wolff) reunite to put their beloved dog to sleep. While their zany mother plans a party to celebrate Stella’s life, things go hilariously awry when the brothers discover they love the same girl.

Romance.title: The Sweet Life
Romance.description: The classic story of “Boy Meets Girl” … until Girl convinces Boy to drive to San Francisco with her … so they can throw themselves off the Golden Gate Bridge.  Only they fall in love along the way.

Romance.title: Those People
Romance.description: On Manhattan’s gilded Upper East Side, Charlie, a young painter, finds the man of his dreams in Tim, an older pianist from across the globe.

Romance.title: Time Freak
Romance.description: Physics prodigy Stillman (Asa Butterfield) is destined for great things, only to be derailed when his girlfriend, Debbie (Sophie Turner) suddenly dumps him.

Romance.title: The Tomorrow Man
Romance.description: Ed spends his life preparing for a disaster that may never come. Ronnie spends her life shopping for things she may never use. In a small town somewhere in America, they try to find love while trying not to get lost in each other's stuff.

Romance.title: Top End Wedding.
Romance.description: Lauren and Ned are engaged, they are in love, and they have just ten days to find Lauren's mother who has gone AWOL somewhere in the remote far north of Australia, reunite her parents and pull off their dream wedding.

Romance.title: Touched With Fire
Romance.description: From Executive Producer Spike Lee. Katie Holmes and Luke Kirby star as bipolar poets who begin a romance that puts their hearts (and minds) to the ultimate test.

Romance.title: The Truth About Christmas
Romance.description: An encounter with a Santa results in a drastic change.

Romance.title: What Men Want
Romance.description: A woman is boxed out by the male sports agents in her profession, but gains an unexpected edge over them when she develops the ability to hear their thoughts.

Romance.title: Where Hands Touch
Romance.description: When the daughter of a white German mother and an African father meets a member of the Hitler Youth - compulsory for all Aryan boys in 1944 Germany, they must battle against the fates laid out before them during the most brutal of times.

Romance.title: Women and Sometimes Men.
Romance.description: Briefly engaged, Sara decides to call off her marriage. She had an experience with a woman in college and wants that feeling again, without giving up men. This launches Sara on a journey filled with laughter, tears, women and sometimes men.

Romance.title: Wristcutters: A Love Story.
Romance.description: Zia (Patrick Fugit) cuts his wrists and enters a bizarre afterlife reserved for suicides.

Romance.title: xx/xy
Romance.description: A man finds himself having to decide between one of two women, not once, but twice. This drama stars Mark Ruffalo and was nominated for the Grand Jury Prize at Sundance.

Romance.title: The Yellow Handkerchief
Romance.description: A road trip through Louisiana transforms three strangers who were originally brought together by their respective feelings of loneliness.

Romance.title: Zapped
Romance.description: Zoey discovers a smartphone app that magically controls boys.

Science Fiction.title: (Dub) Mass Effect: Paragon Lost
Science Fiction.description: Mass Effect: Paragon Lost, the prequel to best-selling Mass Effect 3, follows the early career of Alliance Marine, James Vega, as he leads an elite Special Forces squad into battle against mysterious aliens known as The Collectors.

Science Fiction.title: (Dub) Sword Art Online: The Movie - Ordinal Scale
Science Fiction.description: Two years after the SAO incident, a new Augmented-Reality MMO, Ordinal Scale, has become an instant hit. As Kirito and Asuna explore, they soon realize that the line between the virtual world and reality is blurring, and it isn't all fun and games.

Science Fiction.title: (Sub) Akira
Science Fiction.description: Clandestine army activities threaten the war torn city of Neo-Tokyo when a mysterious child with powerful psychic abilities escapes his prison and inadvertently draws a violent motorcycle gang into a heinous web of experimentation.

Science Fiction.title: (Sub) Fafner: Heaven and Earth
Science Fiction.description: A hiveminded alien force reengages war with Tatsumiya Island years after Kazuki led a team of mech pilots to destroy them. In an explosive battle over the fate of humankind, the young warriors risk everything to save their only home from assimilation.

Science Fiction.title: (Sub) K MISSING KINGS
Science Fiction.description: Ever since the School Island Incident, in which the four Kings were involved, the Silver Clansman, Kuroh Yatogami and Neko were on their search for their master Shiro.

Science Fiction.title: (Sub) Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky
Science Fiction.description: Ten years ago, an invasion by the Erebonians almost shattered the Kingdom of Liberl. For Estelle Bright it’s all ancient history. But history repeats; as Estelle and her brother find themselves in the wrong place when mayhem breaks out.

Science Fiction.title: (Sub) Sword Art Online: The Movie - Ordinal Scale
Science Fiction.description: Two years after the SAO incident, a new Augmented-Reality MMO, Ordinal Scale, has become an instant hit. As Kirito and Asuna explore, they soon realize that the line between the virtual world and reality is blurring, and it isn't all fun and games.

Science Fiction.title: (Sub) Trigun: Badlands Rumble
Science Fiction.description: Twenty years ago, Vash the Stampede allowed an infamous outlaw named Gasback to escape final justice. Now, on the streets of Macca City, Vash is about to learn a hard truth about consequences - and he might end up paying for the lesson with his life.

Science Fiction.title: A.R.C.H.I.E. 2: Mission Impawsible
Science Fiction.description: In this outrageous family comedy-adventure, Michael J. Fox plays Archie, a flying, talking robot dog who becomes a big-top star when his owner runs away to join the circus.

Science Fiction.title: Above the Shadows.
Science Fiction.description: A supernatural tale starring Olivia Thirlby, Alan Ritchson, Jim Gaffigan, Maria Dizzia, Tito Ortiz, David Johansen, and Megan Fox following an invisible woman who must find her way back with the help of the one man who can see her.

Science Fiction.title: After Darkness
Science Fiction.description: Natalia Dyer ("Stranger Things") and Kyra Sedgwick ("The Closer") highlight this apocalyptic sci-fi thriller about a family's fight to survive a solar disaster.

Science Fiction.title: Almost Human
Science Fiction.description: A quiet night on the outskirts of a small town in Maine is interrupted when Seth (Graham Skipper) witnesses his best friend Mark (Ethier) vanish in a brilliant flash of blue light. Two years later, Seth is still dealing with the fallout from the freaky incident, amid local suspicion that he is to blame for his friend's disappearance. When a string of grisly murders disrupts the community, Seth believes Mark has returned. Together with Mark's ex-girlfriend Jen (Vanessa Leigh), he races to find out if their friend is responsible — or if something beyond their understanding is unfolding before them.

Science Fiction.title: Along With the Gods: The Two Worlds
Science Fiction.description: In this action-packed fantasy epic, a firefighter is taken to the afterlife by three guardians, where only after passing seven trials and proving he lived a noble life will he be able to reincarnate.

Science Fiction.title: Aniara
Science Fiction.description: A spaceship carrying settlers to Mars is knocked off course, causing the consumption-obsessed passengers to consider their place in the universe.

Science Fiction.title: Annihilation
Science Fiction.description: A biologist signs up for a dangerous, secret expedition where the laws of nature don't apply.

Science Fiction.title: Another Time
Science Fiction.description: The top investment manager at his firm is assigned to help the stunning owner of a recently acquired company. He realizes he has fallen for her, and he has to go back in time to meet her before she becomes engaged.

Science Fiction.title: Antiviral
Science Fiction.description: A young man must unravel the mystery surrounding the death of a celebrity to save his own life in this sexy sci-fi thriller.

Science Fiction.title: Barbie in A Christmas Carol
Science Fiction.description: Barbie™ stars in her first holiday movie in this heart-warming adaptation of the classic Dickens story filled with cherished Christmas carols, fabulous fashions and lots of laughs!

Science Fiction.title: Barbie: The Pearl Princess
Science Fiction.description: Join Lumina, the Mermaid princess, and her best friend Kuda, a pink sea horse, as she calls on her magical pearl powers for an unforgettable adventure in a beautiful mermaid world!

Science Fiction.title: Before We Vanish
Science Fiction.description: Three aliens travel to Earth on a mission in preparation for a mass invasion. Having taken possession of human bodies, the visitors rob their hosts of the very essence of their being, leaving psychological and spiritual devastation in their wake.

Science Fiction.title: A Breath Away
Science Fiction.description: A deadly toxic mist has engulfed the city of Paris. Survivors escaped to the rooftops but Mathieu (Romain Duris) and Anna (Olga Kurylenko) must face the fog in order to save their daughter, who is trapped in a medical tank below.

Science Fiction.title: Brown Girl Begins
Science Fiction.description: It’s 2049 and a druglord owns the streets of The Burn. Young Ti-Jeanne must choose between her fear of dying like her mother, or harnessing the power of the Caribbean spirits to save her people.

Science Fiction.title: Bumblebee
Science Fiction.description: Charlie, on the cusp of turning 18 and trying to find her place in the world, discovers Bumblebee, battle-scarred and broken. When Charlie revives him, she quickly learns this is no ordinary, yellow VW bug.

Science Fiction.title: Coherence
Science Fiction.description: In this mind-bending sci-fi thriller, 8 friends at a dinner party start experiencing strange and mysterious events on the night a comet is passing close to Earth. Soon it becomes clear that nothing and no one are what they appear.

Science Fiction.title: The Colony
Science Fiction.description: Years ago, winter came and left. Survivors have tried to build a new society underground, but they soon learn the real danger is not from the ice and cold, but from their fellow survivors.

Science Fiction.title: Colossal
Science Fiction.description: Gloria is an out-of-work party girl forced to leave her life in New York City, and move back home. When reports surface that a giant creature is destroying Seoul, she gradually comes to the realization that she is somehow connected to this phenomenon.

Science Fiction.title: Cosmos.
Science Fiction.description: Three amateur astronomers accidentally intercept what they believe to be a signal from a distant alien civilization, but the truth they uncover is more incredible than any of them dare to believe.

Science Fiction.title: Daylight's End
Science Fiction.description: A rogue drifter agrees to guide a band of survivors to sanctuary after a plague turns most of humanity into monsters.

Science Fiction.title: The Dustwalker.
Science Fiction.description: Set in an isolated town in the middle of a harsh red desert, Sergeant Joanne Sharp fights to protect the town's people as they try to survive an insidious parasite brought to earth by an Alien spacecraft.

Science Fiction.title: Equilibrium.
Science Fiction.description: In a futuristic world, a strict regime has eliminated war by suppressing emotions: books, art and music are strictly forbidden and feeling is a crime punishable by death.

Science Fiction.title: Errors of the Human Body
Science Fiction.description: Haunted by a personal loss, a brilliant geneticist working on a top-secret project unwittingly unleashes a new virus in this intense sci-fi thriller.

Science Fiction.title: Europa Report
Science Fiction.description: An international 6 crew of astronauts undertakes a privately funded mission to search for life on Jupiter's fourth largest moon.

Science Fiction.title: Evolution
Science Fiction.description: In this sci-fi thriller, a remote island is inhabited by young boys who are subjected to strange medical treatments. Soon one boy makes a disturbing discovery beneath the waves.

Science Fiction.title: Fast Color
Science Fiction.description: Hunted by mysterious forces and a local sheriff, a young woman with supernatural abilities flees back to her family-and unearths the depths of the power within her.

Science Fiction.title: Grabbers
Science Fiction.description: In this comic sci-fi thriller, the inhabitants of a small island discover they must get drunk in order to survive an invasion of bloodsucking aliens.

Science Fiction.title: Happily N'Ever After.
Science Fiction.description: When Cinderella's fairytale life takes a radical turn for the worse, she sheds her damsel-in-distress trappings and fights back against her power-mad stepmother!

Science Fiction.title: Higher Power
Science Fiction.description: With his family’s life at stake, a true every-man acquires the power of a god and finds himself the unwilling test subject of a maniacal scientist bent on domination and revenge. From the Producer of Transformers.

Science Fiction.title: The Host.
Science Fiction.description: A creature plunges from a bridge into the Han River, emerging on its shores for a feeding frenzy upon onlookers. When a young girl is snatched in the melee, her family sets off to recover her from the monster that the government claims to be a host of an unidentified virus. Watch the monster movie that destroyed international box office records!

Science Fiction.title: I Still See You
Science Fiction.description: Several years after a cataclysmic event, Ronnie's suburban world has mostly returned to normal, except that the world is shared with ghosts, and one of them appears to be trying to kill her.

Science Fiction.title: I, Frankenstein
Science Fiction.description: Frankenstein's creature finds himself caught in an all-out, centuries old war between two immortal clans.

Science Fiction.title: Kill Order
Science Fiction.description: Uncanny abilities awaken within a troubled high school student when a fully-armed tactical team attempts to abduct him from his classroom.

Science Fiction.title: The Landing
Science Fiction.description: A riveting investigation into the end of Apollo 18, the last US mission to the moon. Interviews conducted for the flight's 25th anniversary reveal new mysteries around the controversial tragedy that almost destroyed an American institution.

Science Fiction.title: The Last Days
Science Fiction.description: As a mysterious epidemic spreads across the planet trapping humanity indoors, one man sets off on a dangerous quest to save his missing girlfriend.

Science Fiction.title: The Last Man
Science Fiction.description: In this apocalyptic thriller, Hayden Christensen plays a vet suffering from PTSD who takes the advice of a street prophet (Harvey Keitel) and starts preparing for the end of days.

Science Fiction.title: Let's Be Evil
Science Fiction.description: In this sci-fi thriller, a desperate young woman takes a job at a school for gifted children only to be thrust into a virtual nightmare and forced to fight for her life.

Science Fiction.title: Little Joe.
Science Fiction.description: Alice is a corporate plant breeder. Against company policy, she takes home her newest creation — a flower capable of making its owner happy. But as ‘Little Joe’ grows, so too do suspicions that it may not be as harmless as it seems.

Science Fiction.title: The Lovers
Science Fiction.description: After a dangerous dive into the wreckage of a British merchant ship to save his wife, a marine biologist falls into a coma that transports us back in time to India in 1788, where a young British captain falls for an Indian woman, in this tale of two centuries, two continents and star-crossed lovers linked together by a powerful ring. Stars Josh Hartnett.

Science Fiction.title: Luis and the Aliens
Science Fiction.description: 12-year-old Luis befriends a trio of awkward aliens who’ve gotten stuck on Earth after watching too much home-shopping network. With a neglectful father at home, Luis decides to escape with the aliens so he can avoid being sent away to a boarding school.

Science Fiction.title: The Mandela Effect.
Science Fiction.description: A man becomes obsessed with facts and events that have been collectively misremembered by thousands of people. Believing the phenomena to be the symptom of something larger, his obsession eventually leads him to question reality itself.

Science Fiction.title: Melancholia.
Science Fiction.description: Justine (Kirsten Dunst) and Michael (Alexander Skarsgård) celebrate their marriage at a sumptuous party in the home of Justine’s sister Claire (Charlotte Gainsbourg) and brother-in-law John (Kiefer Sutherland).

Science Fiction.title: The Monkey King 3
Science Fiction.description: The Monkey King and his traveling companions must find a way to escape from the clutches of a queen who rules an all-female kingdom. They soon land in even deeper trouble when their shenanigans anger the mighty River God.

Science Fiction.title: Monsters at Large
Science Fiction.description: In this spooky family comedy, a teen task force that fights imaginary monsters finds itself face to face with the real thing. But you’ll be laughing too hard to be scared!

Science Fiction.title: Mutant Species.
Science Fiction.description: A rocket containing bio-hazardous material crashes in a remote wooded area. An army team is sent to recover it, but one infected man mutates into a monster. Another escapes and tries to stop the monster and the army team sent to destroy everything.

Science Fiction.title: Narcopolis
Science Fiction.description: In a near future city where drugs are decriminalized, a cop investigating a murder learns that mass legalization can be deadly. Co-stars Jonathan Pryce (Game of Thrones).

Science Fiction.title: The Osiris Child
Science Fiction.description: When a dangerous outbreak threatens to destroy everyone living on a newly colonized planet, Lt. Kane Sommerville goes against orders and leaves his station to rescue his young daughter before it's too late.

Science Fiction.title: Pan.
Science Fiction.description: Hugh Jackman stars in this magical adaptation of 'Peter Pan' that finds Peter up against devious pirate Blackbeard.

Science Fiction.title: Pegasus: Pony with a Broken Wing
Science Fiction.description: When tween girl Sydney and a neighbor boy find a mysterious pony with an injured wing, they secretly heal the creature while racing to save Sydney’s family ranch from developers.

Science Fiction.title: Phoenix Forgotten
Science Fiction.description: 20 years after three teenagers disappeared in the wake of mysterious lights appearing above Phoenix, Arizona, unseen footage from that night has been discovered, chronicling the final hours of their fateful expedition.

Science Fiction.title: Pinocchio (2012)
Science Fiction.description: In this dazzling, delightful reimagining of the classic family legend, a playful puppet comes to life and experiences incredible adventures in his struggle to become human.

Science Fiction.title: Pixi Saves Christmas
Science Fiction.description: For centuries, the many Christmas Genies of the world have worked together to bring magic and happiness to children. This year, however, former genie Monopolish is determined to become The One and Only Christmas Genie and launches a vicious attack on the secret Genies’ Forum. All hope for the survival of Christmas rests with Pixi Post, a lowly elf, who must use all her wits and skills to thwart his evil plan and save the most magical time of year.

Science Fiction.title: Planet 51.
Science Fiction.description: When Chuck the astronaut (Dwayne Johnson) lands on a distant planet filled with little green people, he is surprised to discover that we are not alone in the galaxy.

Science Fiction.title: Prospect
Science Fiction.description: A teenage girl and her father travel to a remote moon on the hunt for elusive riches. But there are others roving the moon's toxic forest and the job quickly devolves into a desperate fight to escape.

Science Fiction.title: Robo-Dog.
Science Fiction.description: Tom Austin creates the most incredible canine the world has ever seen! But Tom's ex-boss Mr. Willis, finds out that Robo-Dog is powered by a technologically advanced super battery, and he plots to steal it for himself.

Science Fiction.title: Santa Hunters
Science Fiction.description: Alex is on a mission to prove Santa is real. With the help of his family and some elaborate traps, they catch the big guy in action. But when they realize Santa is losing his magic they must find a way to restore it before they destroy Christmas!

Science Fiction.title: The Secret of the Nutcracker
Science Fiction.description: In this innovative version of the world famous Christmas story, 12-year-old Clara takes a magical journey on Christmas Eve to find her father in a World War II Prisoner of War camp.

Science Fiction.title: Sorry to Bother You
Science Fiction.description: In an alternate present-day version of Oakland, telemarketer Cassius Green discovers a magical key to professional success, propelling him into a macabre universe.

Science Fiction.title: The Spirit of Christmas
Science Fiction.description: Kate is sent to broker the sale of Hollygrove Inn where she discovers Daniel and agrees to help him solve the mystery of his murder to help him move on, but she didn’t plan on falling in love along the way.

Science Fiction.title: Splitting Adam
Science Fiction.description: After stumbling across a cloning machine, Adam Baker creates multiple versions of himself and finds the answer to handling his many summer responsibilities! Rating: TV-G

Science Fiction.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
Science Fiction.description: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk escapes the tedium of his desk job to embark on another space mission and crosses path with his old enemy, Khan, who is on a mission to destroy the Enterprise, even if it means universal Armageddon. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy.

Science Fiction.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
Science Fiction.description: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk and his crew risk their careers when they steal the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Captain Spock's body. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy.

Science Fiction.title: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
Science Fiction.description: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Captain Kirk and his crew must deal with Spock's long-lost half-brother who hijacks the Enterprise for an obsessive search for God at the center of the galaxy. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy.

Science Fiction.title: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
Science Fiction.description: The crews of the Enterprise and the Excelsior must stop a plot to prevent a peace treaty between the Klingon Empire and the Federation.

Science Fiction.title: Star Trek: Insurrection
Science Fiction.description: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of the federation plot against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Capt. Picard begins an open rebellion.

Science Fiction.title: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
Science Fiction.description: This first Star Trek film reunites the U.S.S. Enterprise's original crew. Capt. James T. Kirk now an admiral, and his crew must save humanity from an alien ship steadily approaching Earth and destroying everything in its path.

Science Fiction.title: Super 8
Science Fiction.description: During the summer of 1979, a group of friends witness a train crash and investigate subsequent unexplained events in their small town.

Science Fiction.title: The Swan Princess: A Royal Family Tale
Science Fiction.description: Shortly after the Royal Family adopts a young girl named Alise, she is taken away into the forest. Princess Odette, Derek and their woodland friends, must work together to find a way to bring her home to the castle.

Science Fiction.title: Tank Girl.
Science Fiction.description: In this laugh-a-minute, futuristic thriller, a mega-villain (Malcolm McDowell) controls the world's water supply, and it's up to Tank Girl (Lori Petty) and her outrageous cohorts to end his greedy reign.

Science Fiction.title: Tetsuo: The Bullet Man
Science Fiction.description: Calm office worker Anthony, son of an American father and a Japanese mother, lives in Tokyo with his wife Yuriko and their little son Tom. Since Anthony’s mother died of cancer, his scientist father has been overly fearful for their health and rigidly subjects Anthony and Tom to monthly physicals. Walking home, Tom is killed in a hit and run before Anthony’s eyes. Losing their boy pushes Yuriko over the edge and triggers violent emotions in Anthony, whose body begins to transform. Little by little, his cells turn into iron. When the driver who killed Tom reappears and Anthony learns the truth about his father’s past experiments on human guinea pigs and about his mother’s death, Anthony mutates into a mass of metal, a human weapon fuelled by an uncontrollable rage.

Science Fiction.title: They Come Knocking
Science Fiction.description: After losing his wife to cancer, a father takes his two daughters on a road trip where he finds his family in the crosshairs of terrifying supernatural entities.

Science Fiction.title: Time Freak
Science Fiction.description: Physics prodigy Stillman (Asa Butterfield) is destined for great things, only to be derailed when his girlfriend, Debbie (Sophie Turner) suddenly dumps him.

Science Fiction.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
Science Fiction.description: When Apollo 11 landed the Moon in 1969, the government discovered an alien spacecraft with technology it kept secret from the Autobots. Presented by FXM

Science Fiction.title: Universal Soldier.
Science Fiction.description: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

Science Fiction.title: Wristcutters: A Love Story.
Science Fiction.description: Zia (Patrick Fugit) cuts his wrists and enters a bizarre afterlife reserved for suicides.

Science Fiction.title: The X-Files: Fight the Future.
Science Fiction.description: FBI agents Mulder and Scully probe events that may prove the existence of aliens on Earth. Based on the TV series.

Science Fiction.title: Zardoz.
Science Fiction.description: Two societies, one intellectual (the Eternals) and the other physical (the Brutals) live side by side but never meet. Sean Connery is a Brutal out to shake things up.

Sports.title: 13 Assassins.
Sports.description: Cult director Takashi Miike (Ichi the Killer, Audition) delivers a bravado period action film set at the end of Japan’s feudal era. 13 Assassins is centered around a group of elite samurai who are secretly enlisted to bring down a sadistic lord.

Sports.title: A 2nd Chance
Sports.description: A young girl and her coach overcome adversity to make their way into the National Gymnastics Competition.

Sports.title: Borg vs McEnroe
Sports.description: It's the summer of 1980, and Björn Borg is the top tennis player in the world, dominating the sport both on and off the court. A powerful and rigorously disciplined player, there is only one obstacle in his pursuit of a record-breaking fifth Wimbledon championship: the highly talented but ferociously abrasive young American John McEnroe. With three days until the tournament begins, Borg trains religiously in his lavish Monaco home, aided by his coach and mentor Lennart and girlfriend Mariana.

Sports.title: The Cage Fighter
Sports.description: A mixed martial arts competitor risks everything—his family, his marriage, even his life—to keep fighting in this riveting, true-life tale of resilience.

Sports.title: Go Tigers!
Sports.description: The residents of Massillon, Ohio live and breathe through their high school football team. This documentary shows how three young football stars carry the burden of victory for their team, their school and their town.

Sports.title: In Search of Greatness
Sports.description: IN SEARCH OF GREATNESS is a groundbreaking documentary that reveals the true nature and nurture of the greatest athletes of all time

Sports.title: Legendary
Sports.description: A book-smart teenager joins his school's wrestling team as a way to reunite his surviving family members, who split apart after the death of his father, a college wrestling legend, 10 years ago.

Sports.title: The Miracle Season
Sports.description: Based on the inspiring true story of West High girls' volleyball team. After the loss of the their star player, Caroline "Line" Found, in an accident, the remaining team players must band together in hopes of winning the state championship.

Sports.title: The Monkey King 3
Sports.description: The Monkey King and his traveling companions must find a way to escape from the clutches of a queen who rules an all-female kingdom. They soon land in even deeper trouble when their shenanigans anger the mighty River God.

Sports.title: No Holds Barred
Sports.description: When world wrestling champion Rip Thomas (Hulk Hogan) refuses to join a competing network, an evil executive creates a new program, "The Battle of the Tough Guys," where rules don't exist and men engage in an all-out brawl for money.

Sports.title: The Reunion
Sports.description: After the death of her father, a daughter fulfills his last wish and finds a way to bring her three brothers back together.

Sports.title: Take Every Wave: The Life of Laird Hamilton
Sports.description: Experience the white-knuckle thrill of big wave surfing through the eyes of Laird Hamilton, a living legend who conquers the world's mightiest tides.

Sports.title: Tracktown
Sports.description: A young long-distance runner twists her ankle during her first Olympic Trials and must do something she’s never done before: take a day off.

Sports.title: Undrafted
Sports.description: When twelve ragtag teammates set out to play what should be a meaningless summer intramural baseball game, it ends up becoming the most important game of their lives.

Sports.title: Warrior
Sports.description: WARRIOR tells the inspirational story of an estranged family that finds redemption in the unlikeliest of places-the MMA ring.

Stand Up.title: Gary Owen: I Agree with Myself
Stand Up.description: Fearless and happy-go-lucky stand-up comedian Gary Owen flips every accepted, politically correct approach to family, race, gender and politics in his hilarious comedy special.

Stand Up.title: Gilbert Gottfried: Dirty Jokes
Stand Up.description: Recorded live in New York City, Gilbert Gottfried at his most shocking and hilarious!  Definitely not for children ... may even be unsuitable for adults!

Stand Up.title: Lewis Black: Old Yeller - Live at the Borgata
Stand Up.description: Lewis Black takes what makes us crazy and makes it funny. It's a night of live comedy you won't forget... but if you do, it's probably because you're taking a drug that lowers your cholesterol.

Stand Up.title: Ron White: A Little Unprofessional
Stand Up.description: Ron White delivers more than an hour of all new material with his signature, irreverent storytelling style and the best comedic timing in the business.

Teen.title: Girls Just Want to Have Fun
Teen.description: Sarah Jessica Parker, Helen Hunt and Shannen Doherty star in the outrageous '80s comedy hit that's totally packed with outrageous '80s fashions, music, dance moves, and more!

Teen.title: Sabrina Down Under
Teen.description: Sabrina aspires to learn about marine biology; when she discovers that the island's marine mammals are falling ill, including a handsome merman and his mermaid sister, she takes up an ecological cause on behalf of all of the inhabitants of the sea.

Teen.title: Zapped
Teen.description: Zoey discovers a smartphone app that magically controls boys.

Thriller.title: 10x10
Thriller.description: Cathy has made a fresh start, but just a few days from opening her new business she is attacked, kidnapped and locked in a room. She assumes the kidnapper wants her body or her life, but he is after something simpler...her name.

Thriller.title: 11 Minutes
Thriller.description: The fates of several people collide over the course of 11 cataclysmic minutes in this stylish roller coaster of a thriller that sprints breathlessly towards a stunning climax.

Dylan Branson (Michiel Huisman) begins to notice the repetition of ominous events that happen at the same time every day. As he’s drawn into a complex relationship with Sarah (Teresa Palmer), Dylan must and take control of time itself.

Thriller.title: 78/52: Hitchcock's Shower Scene
Thriller.description: Just when you thought it was safe to go back in the shower... Discover how Alfred Hitchcock's Psycho changed film history forever with one shocking scene.

Thriller.title: Abduction
Thriller.description: After uncovering a deadly lie, Nathan (Taylor Lautner) is propelled on a lethal, no-holds barred mission to learn the truth.

Thriller.title: Acrimony
Thriller.description: In Tyler Perry's sexy and electrifying thriller, a faithful wife (Taraji. P. Henson) is driven over the edge when it becomes clear she has been betrayed.

Thriller.title: Against the Clock
Thriller.description: After a CIA recruit is seriously injured during a mission, his wife, who is a former operative, becomes determined to find out what happened -- a truth the CIA wants concealed at any cost.

Thriller.title: All That We Destroy
Thriller.description: A geneticist, who fears that her son may be becoming a serial killer, creates a group of clones in an attempt to cure him of his psychopathic tendencies by allowing him to relive the murder of his first victim.

Thriller.title: Angel of Mine
Thriller.description: In this intense thriller, Noomi Rapace stars as a woman on the edge who believes the daughter of a neighbor is actually her own.

Thriller.title: Annihilation
Thriller.description: A biologist signs up for a dangerous, secret expedition where the laws of nature don't apply.

Thriller.title: Anthropoid
Thriller.description: Based  on the extraordinary true story of Operation Anthropoid, the WWII mission to assassinate SS General Reinhard Heydrich, the main architect behind the Final Solution and the Reich’s third in command after Hitler and Himmler.

Thriller.title: Antiviral
Thriller.description: A young man must unravel the mystery surrounding the death of a celebrity to save his own life in this sexy sci-fi thriller.

Thriller.title: The Appearance.
Thriller.description: Mateho the Inquisitor (Jake Stormoen, "The Outpost") and his comrade (Kristian Nairn, “Game of Thrones”) are summoned to investigate a series of mysterious murders and the alleged ‘witch’ accused of the horrific crimes.

Thriller.title: The Appeared
Thriller.description: In this gripping thriller, two siblings find an old diary describing a series of brutal murders, only to encounter what appears to be the identical crime.

Thriller.title: Arbitrage
Thriller.description: Richard Gere leads an all-star cast in an electrifying thriller about a hedge-fund magnate whose fortunes turn when a deadly error threatens to destroy both his financial empire and his family.

Thriller.title: Assassination Tango.
Thriller.description: John J. is a seasoned hit man sent on a job to Argentina. When the General he's sent to kill delays his return to the country, John passes the time with Manuela, a beautiful dancer who becomes his teacher and guide.

Thriller.title: Astral
Thriller.description: A detached university student faces the consequences of astral projection when he uses it to reconnect with his dead mother.

Thriller.title: Backtrace
Thriller.description: Twenty years after a botched robbery, three grifters kidnap an amnesia patient to jog his memory and find the long-lost money.

Thriller.title: Batman Begins.
Thriller.description: With the help of rising cop Jim Gordon, Batman sets out to take down the various nefarious schemes in motion in Gotham City in another action-packed chapter of the Batman saga!

Thriller.title: Before I Go to Sleep
Thriller.description: A woman wakes up every day, remembering nothing as a result of a traumatic accident in her past. One day, new terrifying truths emerge that force her to question everyone around her.

Thriller.title: Before We Vanish
Thriller.description: Three aliens travel to Earth on a mission in preparation for a mass invasion. Having taken possession of human bodies, the visitors rob their hosts of the very essence of their being, leaving psychological and spiritual devastation in their wake.

Thriller.title: Beneath the Darkness
Thriller.description: After watching their best friend get murdered, a group of teens struggle to expose a local hero as the vicious killer and keep from becoming his next victims.

Thriller.title: Beyond the Gates
Thriller.description: Dice turn deadly when two brothers fight to survive a nightmarish role-playing game run by a sinister host (Barbara Crampton) in this throwback thriller.

Thriller.title: Black Rock
Thriller.description: Three childhood friends set aside their personal issues and reunite for a girls' weekend on a remote island off the coast of Maine. One wrong move turns their weekend getaway into a deadly fight for survival.

Thriller.title: Blue City
Thriller.description: After a five year absence, a young man returns home with the intent of reconciling with his father. When he learns that his father has been murdered, he seeks revenge.

Thriller.title: The Blue Room
Thriller.description: Two adulterous lovers go from pillow talk to possible murder in this sexy, brain-teasing thriller. Mathieu Amalric (The Diving Bell and the Butterfly, Grand Budapest Hotel) directs and stars as Julien, a middle-aged salesman embroiled in a steamy love affair with a married woman who, after a round of kinky sex, makes a startling suggestion. Suddenly Julien is caught up in a police investigation—but just what exactly happened? Based on a novel by celebrated crime writer Georges Simenon, this beguiling cinematic puzzle keeps the audience guessing every step of the way.

Thriller.title: The Body
Thriller.description: On Halloween, a hitman finds his work made more difficult when he has to transport a body, but everyone is enamored by what they think is his killer costume.

Thriller.title: Body at Brighton Rock
Thriller.description: An inexperienced park ranger discovers a body on a remote mountain trail and must guard it overnight until the police can arrive. Deep in the wilderness, all alone, she will face her darkest fears.

Thriller.title: Border
Thriller.description: A customs officer who can smell fear develops an unusual attraction to a strange traveler while aiding a police investigation which will call into question her entire existence.

Thriller.title: Bound To Vengeance
Thriller.description: A captive woman escapes from her abductor - and turns the tables on him - in this edge-of-your-seat, bone-crunching revenge thriller.

Thriller.title: Breaking the Girls
Thriller.description: As the friendship between 2 beautiful women deepens, they embark on a murderous pact that escalates beyond their control in a twisted tale of seduction and betrayal.

Thriller.title: A Breath Away
Thriller.description: A deadly toxic mist has engulfed the city of Paris. Survivors escaped to the rooftops but Mathieu (Romain Duris) and Anna (Olga Kurylenko) must face the fog in order to save their daughter, who is trapped in a medical tank below.

Thriller.title: Cabin Fever: Patient Zero
Thriller.description: A group of friends planned the perfect vacation in the Caribbean, but their ultimate weekend devolves into their worst nightmare.

Thriller.title: The Canal
Thriller.description: A man who suspects his wife is cheating on him begins having nightmarish visions of an evil presence that he believes inhabits his house.

Thriller.title: Case 39
Thriller.description: Renee Zellweger stars in this terrifying, supernatural thriller about a social worker who has been assigned the unusual and disturbing case of Lillith Sullivan-a girl with a strange and mysterious past.

Thriller.title: The Chaser
Thriller.description: In this gripping thriller, an ex-cop-turned-pimp must find a serial killer who is preying on call-girls and save the life of a woman who has gone missing.

Thriller.title: Child's Play.
Thriller.description: A contemporary re-imagining of the 1988 horror classic, "Child's Play" follows Karen, a single mother who gifts her son Andy a Buddi doll, unaware of its more sinister nature.

Thriller.title: The Childhood of a Leader
Thriller.description: Robert Pattinson and Bérénice Bejo lead a powerhouse cast in this dark coming-of-age story in which a Hitler-esque dictator is born amid the rising tide of fascism.

Thriller.title: The Clovehitch Killer
Thriller.description: A picture-perfect family is shattered when the work of a serial killer hits too close to home. Dylan McDermott stars in this chilling portrait of all-American evil.

Thriller.title: Coffin Rock
Thriller.description: A married woman's careless one-night-stand becomes a nightmare when her lover ruthlessly stalks her family, in this edge-of-your-seat thriller.

Thriller.title: Coherence
Thriller.description: In this mind-bending sci-fi thriller, 8 friends at a dinner party start experiencing strange and mysterious events on the night a comet is passing close to Earth. Soon it becomes clear that nothing and no one are what they appear.

Thriller.title: The Cokeville Miracle
Thriller.description: Children who were held hostage in their elementary school tell stories of miraculous things, but many adults are skeptical that the Cokeville Miracle ever truly happened.

Thriller.title: The Colony
Thriller.description: Years ago, winter came and left. Survivors have tried to build a new society underground, but they soon learn the real danger is not from the ice and cold, but from their fellow survivors.

Thriller.title: The Commuter
Thriller.description: A man who gets caught up in a criminal conspiracy during his daily commute home and works against the clock to stop a deadly attack to save the lives of his fellow train passengers.

Thriller.title: Constantine.
Thriller.description: A chain-smoking renegade cursed by his ability to see demons and angels helps a young detective whose sister committed suicide.

Thriller.title: Contracted: Phase II
Thriller.description: Infected by a virus, a man (Matt Mercer) races against time to contain the outbreak as it ravages his body.

Thriller.title: Cosmos.
Thriller.description: Three amateur astronomers accidentally intercept what they believe to be a signal from a distant alien civilization, but the truth they uncover is more incredible than any of them dare to believe.

Thriller.title: Crawl.
Thriller.description: A young woman, while attempting to save her father during a Category 5 hurricane, finds herself trapped in a flooding house and must fight for her life against alligators.

Thriller.title: A Crooked Somebody
Thriller.description: Michael Vaughn, a phony psychic medium, is kidnapped by a guilt-ridden murderer who believes Michael can help him make peace with the spirit of his dead victim.

Thriller.title: Crypto
Thriller.description: In this cyber-thriller starring Kurt Russell and Beau Knapp, a Wall Street banker connects a small-town art gallery to a global conspiracy, putting his own family in grave danger.

Thriller.title: Culture Shock
Thriller.description: This thriller follows a young Mexican woman in pursuit of the American Dream, who crosses illegally into the United States, only to find herself in an American nightmare.

Thriller.title: Da Sweet Blood of Jesus.
Thriller.description: In this stylized Spike Lee thriller, a man cursed by a mysterious ancient African artifact is overwhelmed by a newfound thirst for blood, which leads him into a dangerous romance that calls into question the very nature of love, addiction, sex and status.

Thriller.title: Damascus Cover
Thriller.description: A man haunted by the death of his son must smuggle a chemical weapons scientist out of Syria. Within days his mission goes wrong. To survive, Ari reaches out to a deep cover agent and soon discovers that he is a pawn in a much bigger plan.

Thriller.title: The Damned
Thriller.description: The wicked horror-thriller THE DAMNED follows American David Reynolds (Peter Facinelli), widowed from his Colombian-born wife, who flies to Bogota with his new fiancée (Sophia Myles) to retrieve his rebellious teenage daughter Jill (Nathalia Ramos).  En route to the city of Medellin, a car accident leaves them stranded in a rundown isolated inn.  When they discover the old innkeeper has locked a young girl in the basement, they are determined to set her free.  But no good deed goes unpunished, as they unwittingly unleash a centuries-old evil that will stop at nothing to destroy all in its path. THE DAMNED takes the traditional haunted house film and turns it on its head, taking audiences on a wild and terrifying ride they're not soon to forget.

Thriller.title: The Dark Knight.
Thriller.description: The Caped Crusader is pushed to the limit by the diabolical Joker in this blockbuster action sequel.

Thriller.title: Death Bell
Thriller.description: In this terrifying thriller, an elite group of students learns that one will die for every exam question they get wrong.

Thriller.title: Death Wish
Thriller.description: A mild-mannered father is transformed into a killing machine after his family is torn apart by a violent act.

Thriller.title: Delivered.
Thriller.description: A pregnant woman’s life is upended when she realizes someone close to her has darker plans for her and the baby.

Thriller.title: Dementia
Thriller.description: In this frightening psychological thriller, an aging veteran is terrorized by his deceptive and devious caretaker.

Thriller.title: The Den
Thriller.description: After receiving a grant for her graduate thesis, Elizabeth Benton (Melanie Papalia) logs onto a video-chat site known as The Den, on a mission to explore the habits of its users.  During one of her random video-chats, Elizabeth watches in horror as a teenage girl is gruesomely murdered in front of her webcam. While the police dismiss it as a viral prank, Elizabeth believes what she saw is real and takes it upon herself to find the truth.  Her life quickly spirals out of control as she gets pulled deeper into the darkest recesses of the internet.  And eventually, Elizabeth finds herself trapped in a twisted game in which she and her loved ones are targeted for the same grisly fate as the first victim.

Thriller.title: Depraved
Thriller.description: Larry Fessenden returns with a modern twist on the Frankenstein myth, featuring a fanatical doctor as he reconstructs an unsuspecting man out of spare body parts.

Thriller.title: Dept Q: The Keeper of Lost Causes
Thriller.description: Police inspector Carl Morck and his assistant investigate a cold case involving a missing woman.

Thriller.title: Dept. Q: A Conspiracy of Faith
Thriller.description: Department Q goes on the hunt for a serial killer when a desperate message, written in blood by two children, is found 14 years after they were kidnapped.

Thriller.title: Dept. Q: The Absent One
Thriller.description: The brutal, 20-year-old murder of a pair of twins is double the trouble for the detectives of Department Q in this gripping second installment in the blockbuster crime series.

Thriller.title: Destroyer
Thriller.description: Destroyer is a gritty, riveting and complex crime thriller starring Oscar-winner Nicole Kidman in a virtuoso performance as a hardened detective worn down by the rigors of her job and the aftermath of an undercover FBI sting gone horribly wrong.

Thriller.title: Detroit
Thriller.description: From the Academy Award winning director of THE HURT LOCKER and ZERO DARK THIRTY, DETROIT tells the gripping story of one of the most terrifying moments during the civil unrest that rocked Detroit in the summer of '67.

Thriller.title: Devil's Gate
Thriller.description: When a woman and her son mysteriously vanish, FBI agent Daria Francis is dispatched to the small town of Devil's Gate, N.D., to investigate the primary suspect: religious fanatic Jackson Pritchard, husband and father of the missing persons. But when Francis and local deputy Colt arrive at Pritchard's foreboding property, they discover much more than they bargained for lurking in the basement.

Thriller.title: The Dinner.
Thriller.description: Two estranged brothers and their wives meet at a restaurant to discuss a grotesque crime committed by their sons. With their involvement still a secret, they must decide how far they’ll go to protect the ones they love.

Thriller.title: The Disappointments Room
Thriller.description: A mother and her young son release unimaginable horrors from a hidden room in the attic of their rural dream home.

Thriller.title: Dismissed.
Thriller.description: A discouraged high school teacher is thrilled by an honor student’s arrival until he realizes how far the vengeful scholar will go for a perfect GPA.

Thriller.title: Disorder
Thriller.description: Suffering from post-traumatic stress disorder, a security guard (Matthias Schoenaerts) utilizes his training as a French special forces soldier to protect the wife (Diane Kruger) and son (Zaïd Errougui-Demonsant) of a shady Lebanese businessman.

Thriller.title: Distorted
Thriller.description: An artist who suffers from bipolar disorder suspects the residents of her luxury apartment building are being subliminally brainwashed.

Thriller.title: Dogman (2018)
Thriller.description: Marcello is coerced into the petty criminal schemes of the local bully. When Simoncino’s abuse finally brings Marcello to a breaking point, he decides to stand up for his own dignity through an act of vengeance, with unintended consequences.

Thriller.title: The Domestics
Thriller.description: A survival love story! A young husband and wife must fight to return home in a post-apocalyptic mid-western landscape ravaged by gangs.

Thriller.title: Don't Go
Thriller.description: Between dreams and reality lies a terrifying hidden truth… A grieving father's nightmare holds the key to his daughter's death in this tantalizing psychological puzzle.

Thriller.title: Down
Thriller.description: A pair of coworkers gets trapped in an elevator over a long weekend, but what at first promises to be a romantic connection turns nefarious as each party begins to reveal who they truly are.

Thriller.title: The Dustwalker.
Thriller.description: Set in an isolated town in the middle of a harsh red desert, Sergeant Joanne Sharp fights to protect the town's people as they try to survive an insidious parasite brought to earth by an Alien spacecraft.

Thriller.title: Errors of the Human Body
Thriller.description: Haunted by a personal loss, a brilliant geneticist working on a top-secret project unwittingly unleashes a new virus in this intense sci-fi thriller.

Thriller.title: Escape from Alcatraz.
Thriller.description: Based on true events! A hardened convict engineers an elaborate plan to escape infamous Alcatraz Prison - a feat nobody had successfully accomplished before. Directed by Don Siegel (Dirty Harry).

Thriller.title: Europa Report
Thriller.description: An international 6 crew of astronauts undertakes a privately funded mission to search for life on Jupiter's fourth largest moon.

Thriller.title: Evolution
Thriller.description: In this sci-fi thriller, a remote island is inhabited by young boys who are subjected to strange medical treatments. Soon one boy makes a disturbing discovery beneath the waves.

Thriller.title: Eye In The Sky.
Thriller.description: A thriller set in the world of remotely piloted aircraft warfare.

Thriller.title: Fair Game.
Thriller.description: The real-life scandal involving the public exposure of Valerie Plame as an undercover CIA agent by vindictive White House officials determined to punish her husband Joe Wilson for his political views is recounted in this drama starring Naomi Watts, Sean Penn and Sam Shepard.

Thriller.title: Fast Color
Thriller.description: Hunted by mysterious forces and a local sheriff, a young woman with supernatural abilities flees back to her family-and unearths the depths of the power within her.

Thriller.title: Feral
Thriller.description: Six friends fight to survive a cannibal-zombie plague on a camping trip gone terrifyingly wrong. With Halloween's Scout Taylor-Compton and The Walking Dead's Lew Temple.

Thriller.title: Flesh & Blood
Thriller.description: On Thanksgiving, teenager Kimberly tries to move on from her mom’s unsolved murder to cure her agoraphobia. But under the care of her doting father, she starts to suspect that she is in danger and it’s always the ones you love who hurt you the most.

Thriller.title: Friday The 13th, Part III.
Thriller.description: A group of teenagers heads up to a camp in the country and becomes the target of a psycho lurking about.

Thriller.title: Friday the 13th: The Final Chapter.
Thriller.description: Having been revived at the hospital, Jason returns to Crystal Lake to meet more victims. However, this time has he met his match in Tommy Jarvis?

Thriller.title: The Frozen Ground
Thriller.description: Inspired by the incredible true story that follows Alaskan State Trooper Jack Halcombe as he sets out to end the murderous rampage of Robert Hansen, a serial killer who has gone unnoticed for 13 years.

Thriller.title: The Gallows Act II.
Thriller.description: While pursuing her dreams of stardom, a teenage actress is drawn into the dark world of a malevolent spirit in this supernatural thriller from Blumhouse, the producer of Paranormal Activity, Insidious and The Gallows.

Thriller.title: Gemini
Thriller.description: A heinous crime tests the complex relationship between a Hollywood starlet and her tenacious personal assistant. As the assistant unravels the mystery, she must confront her own understanding of friendship, truth and celebrity.

Thriller.title: Getaway
Thriller.description: A washed-up race car driver finds himself in a race against time to save his abducted wife in this heart-pounding thriller.

Thriller.title: Ghost Stories
Thriller.description: A man looking to debunk a series of paranormal events falls into a world of terror. Martin Freeman stars in a tale that will haunt your dreams.

Thriller.title: Good Boy.
Thriller.description: When Maggie gets an emotional support dog to help quell some of her anxiety, she finds him to be even more effective than she imagined... because he kills anyone who adds stress to her life.

Thriller.title: Gorky Park
Thriller.description: An detective on the Moscow police force relentlessly pursues the killer of a triple homicide in Moscow's Gorky Park only to find his investigation uncovers a political conspiracy that no one wants exposed.

Thriller.title: Grabbers
Thriller.description: In this comic sci-fi thriller, the inhabitants of a small island discover they must get drunk in order to survive an invasion of bloodsucking aliens.

Thriller.title: Greener Grass
Thriller.description: Suburbia has never been so hilariously absurd as it is in GREENER GRASS – where one eccentric housewife is driven mad by her eagerness to please. SNL's Beck Bennett co-stars.

Thriller.title: The Guilty
